channel.title: Block single clearnet pages in Whonix
channel.description:
Hi,
i'm quite new to Whonix and I like it a lot.
I'm wondering if it is possible to block access to clearnet pages, i.e. spiegel homepage in Whonix? I didn't find any hint in the documentation or the internet.
Thanks in advance for your feedback!
Brgds

item.title: Block single clearnet pages in Whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Updated just now:

  • Blacklist Outgoing Connections to Select Domains

Maybe that would be sufficient?

Read full topic
item.source: Block single clearnet pages in Whonix
